name: SpiderHeck
description: SpiderHeck is a physics-based brawler thatâ€™s easy to pick up but difficult to master. Duel to the death or choose to team up and hold back swarms of savage enemies. Swing, stab and shoot your way around the map, while effortlessly performing movie-worthy parkour.
shortDescription: SpiderHeck is a 2d physics-based co-op brawler for 1-4 players.

name: Bopl Battle
description: Bopl Battle is a 2D platformer fighting game for 1-4 players. Compete against your friends or CPU opponents in a variety of game modes.
shortDescription: Bopl Battle is a 2D platformer fighting game.

name: Block Mechanic
description: Block Mechanic is a 2D platformer game for 1 player. Build and manage your own block-based world.
shortDescription: Block Mechanic is a 2D platformer game.

name: Mind Over Magnet
description: Mind Over Magnet is a puzzle-platformer where you solve intricate magnetic challenges. Use creativity and logic to overcome obstacles.
shortDescription: Solve magnetic puzzles in this innovative platformer.

name: Tank Team
description: Tank Team is a cooperative tank warfare game. Join your squad and strategize to outmaneuver opponents in a variety of terrains.
shortDescription: Team up for tank battles in this cooperative game.

name: Final Earth 2
description: Final Earth 2 is a vertical city-building game set in a post-apocalyptic future. Construct a thriving colony in space and manage resources wisely.
shortDescription: Build a vertical city in this post-apocalyptic simulator.

name: Cookie Clicker
description: Cookie Clicker is a beloved incremental game where you produce and collect cookies by clicking and upgrading production.
shortDescription: Bake cookies endlessly in this incremental game.

name: Brotato
description: Brotato is a top-down arena shooter roguelike where you control a potato wielding up to six weapons at once to fight off hordes of aliens.
shortDescription: Shoot your way through alien hordes in Brotato.

name: Undertale
description: Undertale is a role-playing game where you decide the fate of your enemies. Fight or spare them in this heartwarming indie masterpiece.
shortDescription: Choose your path in this heartwarming indie RPG.

name: Muck
description: Muck is a survival-roguelike where you collect resources, craft tools, and fend off enemies to survive as long as possible.
shortDescription: Survive and thrive in this survival-roguelike game.
